dcterms:description: A proprietary dataset containing pseudorandomized HR data with detailed information about the skills profiles of job seekers and vacancies, used to construct models and generate counterfactual instances.
dcterms:title: VDAB Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset described as containing over 12 million job listings from a Belgian employment agency (VDAB), used for various employability-related analyses.
dcterms:title: Job Listings Dataset
